doc:
Carl Switzer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Switzer 0 Carl Dean Switzer (August 7, 1927 – January 21, 1959) was an American singer, child actor, dog breeder and guide. Switzer began his career as a child actor in the mid-1930s appearing in the Our Gang short subjects series as Alfalfa, one of the series' most popular and best-remembered characters. After leaving the series in 1940, Switzer struggled to find substantial roles owing to typecasting. As an adult, he appeared mainly in bit parts and B-movies. He later became a dog breeder and hunting guide. Switzer married in 1954 and had one son before divorcing in 1957. In January 1959, he was fatally shot by an acquaintance in a dispute over money. Carl_Dean_Switzer ( August_7_,_1927 – January_21_,_1959 ) was an_American_singer , child_actor , dog_breeder_and_guide . Switzer began his_career as a_child_actor in the_mid-1930s appearing in the_Our_Gang_short_subjects_series as Alfalfa , one of the_series_'_most_popular_and_best-remembered_characters . After leaving the_series in 1940 , Switzer struggled_to_find substantial_roles owing to typecasting . As an_adult , he appeared mainly in bit_parts_and_B-movies . He later became a_dog_breeder_and_hunting_guide . Switzer married in 1954 and had one_son before divorcing in 1957 . In January_1959 , he was_fatally_shot by an_acquaintance in a_dispute over money .
